summary: Tested 4 SEO tasks: 1) SEO-friendly country URLs (52+ slugs work correctly), 2) HowTo schema on Compare page with 4 steps, 3) Hreflang tags (x-default and en), 4) Speed optimization via lazy loading. All features working correctly except sitemap has 12 SEO slugs instead of full 52+.

minor.issue: Sitemap only includes 12 SEO-friendly country slug URLs (e.g., /india-youtubers) but frontend has 52+ country slugs defined. Should sync sitemap seo_slugs with frontend COUNTRY_SLUGS for full SEO coverage.

details.location: Document head, added via HreflangTags component

action_items: OPTIONAL: Update backend seo_slugs dict in server.py to include all 52 country slugs from frontend COUNTRY_SLUGS for complete sitemap coverage
context_for_next_testing_agent: SEO features implemented: 1) CountrySlugRedirect component handles 52+ country slugs like /india-youtubers -> /country/IN. 2) ComparePage has HowTo JSON-LD schema with 4 steps and BreadcrumbList schema (Home > Tools > Compare Channels). 3) HreflangTags component adds x-default and en hreflang tags to document head. 4) Speed optimization via React.lazy. Note: Sitemap has only 12 SEO slugs vs 52 in frontend - minor sync issue.
